recipe.title: Asian Scallop Stew with Coconut, Ginger and Lime
ingredients: 12 ounces sea scallops, halved if very large
1/2 large red bell pepper, cut into 1 x 1/4-inch strips
1 tablespoon fish sauce (nam pla) or soy sauce
instructions: Combine scallops, coconut milk, red bell pepper and ginger in heavy medium saucepan. Bring just to boil over medium-high heat. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until scallops are just opaque in center, about 5 minutes. Remove pan from heat. Mix in lime juice, fish sauce and green onions. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Ladle into bowls and serve.
